name: Crafted_Entropic_Chaos_D
display_help: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance costs by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
